column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I got the Tonkotsu Black and I got a combination with the Tokyo Curry and Salad
column2: while my fiancee got the Spicy Chicken Ramen. Both were great
column3: but I would have to give the slight edge to Tonkotsu Black because of the broth. Unfortunately
column4: when we got there we were informed of a 35 minute wait
column5: and it took us nearly 50 minutes for us to be seated in the communal table. That was the only bad part of the night. Other than that slight little blip
column6: I love the place. Its a hot resturant which means it will be busy
column7: so be prepared for a wait.
